sentence.Network_en: The Russian and American armies linked up for the first time on the banks of the river Elbe.
sentence.Network_cn: 俄美两军在易北河岸首次会师。

sentence.Network_en: The vanguard of the American army reached the Elbe, only fifty - three miles from Berlin.
sentence.Network_cn: 美军先头部队到达易北河, 离柏林仅 五十三 英里.

sentence.Network_en: The train bowls along the valley of the Elbe by the glittery river.
sentence.Network_cn: 列车在易北河流域沿着闪闪发光的河流疾驰.
